Hello, I'm Anagh! Welcome to my personal website! Here, you can learn more about me and my interests. Feel free to explore the rest of the site. I enjoy Classical Hindustani music, and love to write poetry and shayaris.

Short Bio- I am Anagh Chattopadhyay, a first-year Ph.D. Candidate at the Department of Biostatistics, Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. My primary research interests are Biostatistics, Health Economics, Health Policy and Machine Learning. I am also interested in the intersection of Health and Linguistics.
